name: Back Vitalizer
descr:
The Back Vitalizer also helps you …

  • Enhance your core stability, and improve your performance in your favorite outdoor activities.
  • Exercise the deep stabilizing muscles in your lower back, and protect your lower back from injury.
  • Support natural curvature of your spine, and maintain your body´s endurance.
  • Relieve spine´s intradiscal pressure, and prevent your spinal discs from being herniated .
  • Increase blood circulation to your back muscles, and prevent your back from fatigue and stiffness.
  • Improve lubrication to your spinal discs, and extend the healthy life span of your spine.
  • Train your balance control, and prevent you from unnecessary falling.
  • Rehabilitate knee or ankle, and recover from injury well and fast.
  • Promote blood circulation in legs and feet, and prevent swelling in legs during long haul flights.
